text: 加熱したハッチを 無理やりこじ開けてね / 手のひらの火傷はその時のものよ
translation: He forced open the heated hatch. The burn on his palm is from that time.

vocabulary.meaning: to pry open, to force open

grammar: ~てね at the end softens the statement. その時のもの means 'the one from that time'

text: レイ 聞こえるか
translation: Rei, can you hear me?

vocabulary.meaning: to be audible, to be heard

grammar: ~か at the end forms a yes/no question. 聞こえる is the potential form of 聞く

text: はい / 距離0号機の再起動実験を行う / 第一次接続開始
translation: Yes. / We will conduct the restart experiment for Unit 00. / Begin first connection.
grammar: ~を行う means 'to conduct/carry out'. 第一次 means 'first, primary'

text: 主電源コンタクト / 稼働電圧、輪回転を突破 / 了解 / フォーマットフェーズ2へ行こう
translation: Main power contact. / Operating voltage, breakthrough critical threshold. / Roger. / Let's proceed to format phase 2.
grammar: ~を突破 means 'to break through'. ~へ行こう means 'let's go to/proceed to'

text: パイロット、0号機と接続開始 / 回線開きます
translation: Pilot, beginning connection with Unit 00. / Opening circuit.
grammar: ~と means 'with'. ~を開きます is polite form of 'to open'

text: パルス予備ハーモニクス、正常 / シンクロ、問題なし、
translation: Pulse reserve harmonics, normal. / Synch, no problems.
grammar: ~なし means 'without, none'. Technical status report format is commonly noun + status

text: オルナーブリンク終了 / 再計算誤差修正なし
translation: All nerve link complete. / Recalculation error correction, none.
grammar: ~なし indicates absence or negation. Technical compound nouns are common in scientific contexts

text: チェック2590までリストクリア / 絶対境界線まであと2.5 / 1.7 / 1.2 / 1.0 / 0.8 / 0.6
translation: List clear up to check 2590. / To absolute borderline, 2.5 remaining... 1.7... 1.2... 1.0... 0.8... 0.6...
grammar: ~まで means 'up to, until'. あと means 'remaining, left'

text: 0.5 / 0.4 / 0.3 / 0.2 / 0.1 / 突破 / ボーダーラインクリア / 0号機起動しました
translation: 0.5... 0.4... 0.3... 0.2... 0.1... / Breakthrough! / Borderline cleared. / Unit 00 has been activated.
grammar: ~しました is past tense polite form indicating completed action

text: 了解
translation: Roger.
grammar: Standard military/technical acknowledgment term

text: はい。
translation: Yes.
grammar: Standard affirmative response

text: 再起動は成功した 戻れ
translation: The restart was successful. Return.
grammar: ~した is past tense. 戻れ is imperative form meaning 'return'

text: 目標はトーノサワ上空を通過 / 初号機発進準備に入ります
translation: Target is passing through airspace above Tonosawa. / Beginning launch preparations for Unit 01.
grammar: ~を通過 means 'to pass through'. ~に入ります means 'to enter into, begin'

text: 第1ロックボルト発電
translation: First lock bolt release.
grammar: Technical terminology for mechanical release systems

text: 解 / 除確認 / 了解 / 第2高速部発電 / 了軍 / 目標は足の子上空へ進入
translation: Release / confirmed. / Roger. / Second high-speed section release. / Roger. / Target entering airspace above Ashinoko.
grammar: ~へ進入 means 'entering into'. 了解/了軍 are acknowledgment terms

text: エヴァ初号機発進準備よろしい / 発進
translation: Eva Unit 01 launch preparations complete. / Launch!
grammar: よろしい indicates readiness or approval in formal contexts

text: 「目標
translation: Target...
grammar: Incomplete sentence indicating interrupted speech

text: シンジカン!
translation: Shinji-kun!
grammar: ~君 (kun) is an informal honorific used for boys or junior males

text: シンジは助かった / だがその傷は彼に甘え / た言葉を吐かす / 突き放すレイ
translation: Shinji was saved. But his wounds make him speak dependent words. Rei pushes him away.

vocabulary.meaning: to make say, to spit out

grammar: Preview/narration style. ~を吐かす is causative form 'to make (him) say'

text: 一方ミサトは首都に対し一点突破を試みる
translation: Meanwhile, Misato attempts a single-point breakthrough against the capital.
grammar: ~に対し means 'toward, against'. ~を試みる means 'to attempt'

text: 次回決戦第三新東京市
translation: Next episode: Decisive Battle, Third New Tokyo City.
grammar: Episode preview format: 次回 + title
